Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Okhunala khwabu tsinjendo tsieyirotso nende tseshirumbi
Khomana balaame Nyasaye wabu Omulesi owe Inzu ino
Ulia Ubaliisinjia balanyoola inzala tawe, mana nabaliinda okhurulana nende oburi
Koo! olutsikhwo ulia ukananga umurungo kwe inyanga ye indukho
Nohomba shakholangakhwo eshinani shokhulisia umutakha tawe
kho laama ne osinze khulwa Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi
